mapper.insert:
insert into rabbit_breeding (femaleRabbitNo, maleRabbitNo, breedingTime, twelveDayMoldTire, birthTime, nestLittersNumber, nestLiveRabbitsNumber, nestLiveRabbitsRate, nestWeakDeadRabbitsNumber, nestWeakDeadRabbitsRate, nestWeakRabbitsNumber, nestWeakRabbitsRate, nestDeathRabbitRate, deathRabbitRate, newbornNestWeight, newbornAverageWeight, sucklingRabbitsNumber, twentyOneDaysOldNestWeight, weaningNestWeight, lactationAverageDailyGain, lactationConsumption, lactationAverageMaterialWeightRatio, tiresNumber)values
(#{item.femaleRabbitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maleRabbitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.breedingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.twelveDayMoldTire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.nestLittersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nestLiveRabbitsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nestLiveRabbitsRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.nestWeakDeadRabbitsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nestWeakDeadRabbitsRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.nestWeakRabbitsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nestWeakRabbitsRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.nestDeathRabbitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.deathRabbitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.newbornNestWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.newbornAverageWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.sucklingRabbitsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.twentyOneDaysOldNestWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.weaningNestWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.lactationAverageDailyGain,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.lactationConsumption,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.lactationAverageMaterialWeightRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.tiresNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select breedingInformationId, femaleRabbitNo, maleRabbitNo, breedingTime, twelveDayMoldTire, birthTime, nestLittersNumber, nestLiveRabbitsNumber, nestLiveRabbitsRate, nestWeakDeadRabbitsNumber, nestWeakDeadRabbitsRate, nestWeakRabbitsNumber, nestWeakRabbitsRate, nestDeathRabbitRate, deathRabbitRate, newbornNestWeight, newbornAverageWeight, sucklingRabbitsNumber, twentyOneDaysOldNestWeight, weaningNestWeight, lactationAverageDailyGain, lactationConsumption, lactationAverageMaterialWeightRatio, tiresNumber from rabbit_breeding
mapper.delete:
delete from rabbit_breeding where breedingInformationId in
#{item}
